## bronzitePlugin() function

Creates a bronzite plugin.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function bronzitePlugin(cb: BronzitePluginCallback, data: BronzitePluginMetadata): CallableBronzitePluginMetadata;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cb | BronzitePluginCallback | The callback to use for the plugin. |
|  data | BronzitePluginMetadata | The metadata for the plugin. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[CallableBronzitePluginMetadata](./framework.callablebronzitepluginmetadata.md)
